_meta: This note has type `canvas`. It uses excalidraw and stores an exported svg alongside.

elements.text: For 4 bit Exponent using bias we can store exponent as unsigned integer
elements.originalText: For 4 bit Exponent using bias we can store exponent as unsigned integer

elements.text:
For 32 Bits Float: 1 Signed Bit, 8 Exponent Bits, 23 Mantissa bits
For 64 Bits Float: 1 Signed Bit, 11 Exponent Bits, 52 Mantissa bits
elements.originalText:
For 32 Bits Float: 1 Signed Bit, 8 Exponent Bits, 23 Mantissa bits
For 64 Bits Float: 1 Signed Bit, 11 Exponent Bits, 52 Mantissa bits

elements.text:
Implicit: Move the Radix Point to RHS
        of the most significant 1
elements.originalText:
Implicit: Move the Radix Point to RHS
        of the most significant 1

elements.text: Explicit vs Implicit 10 Bit float 4 bit Exponent
elements.originalText: Explicit vs Implicit 10 Bit float 4 bit Exponent

elements.text: * 1 at end is ignored because no space is left
elements.originalText: * 1 at end is ignored because no space is left

elements.text:
* 1 at the beginning is ignored because mantissa 
is only considered after the radix point
elements.originalText:
* 1 at the beginning is ignored because mantissa 
is only considered after the radix point

elements.text:
Explicit: Move the Radix Point to LHS
        of the most significant 1
elements.originalText:
Explicit: Move the Radix Point to LHS
        of the most significant 1

elements.text:
Largest Positive Number: 
(2 - 2^-(M-1)) * 2^(MaxE - Bias)

Smallest Positive Number:
1 * 2^(MinE - Bias)

Second Smallest Positive number:
(1 + 2^-(M-1)) * 2^(MinE - Bias)
elements.originalText:
Largest Positive Number: 
(2 - 2^-(M-1)) * 2^(MaxE - Bias)

Smallest Positive Number:
1 * 2^(MinE - Bias)

Second Smallest Positive number:
(1 + 2^-(M-1)) * 2^(MinE - Bias)

elements.text:
Let N1 = (-1)^S1 * F1 * 2^E1)
And N2 = (-1)^S2 * F2 * 2^E2)
Then N1 * N2  = (-1)^(S1 xor S2) * (F1 * F2) * 2^(E1 + E2)
Since 1 <= F1 * F2 < 4 the result may need to be normalized
elements.originalText:
Let N1 = (-1)^S1 * F1 * 2^E1)
And N2 = (-1)^S2 * F2 * 2^E2)
Then N1 * N2  = (-1)^(S1 xor S2) * (F1 * F2) * 2^(E1 + E2)
Since 1 <= F1 * F2 < 4 the result may need to be normalized

elements.text:
Let N1 = (-1)^S1 * F1 * 2^E1)
And N2 = (-1)^S2 * F2 * 2^E2)
Then N1 * N2  = (-1)^(S1 xor S2) * (F1 / F2) * 2^(E1 - E2)
Since 0.5 < F1 / F2 <= 1 the result may need to be normalized
elements.originalText:
Let N1 = (-1)^S1 * F1 * 2^E1)
And N2 = (-1)^S2 * F2 * 2^E2)
Then N1 * N2  = (-1)^(S1 xor S2) * (F1 / F2) * 2^(E1 - E2)
Since 0.5 < F1 / F2 <= 1 the result may need to be normalized

text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">        of the most significant 1</text></g><g transform="translate(295.6926812065976 1541.2072651869908) rotate(0 165.5 101.5)"><text x="0" y="17.375" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Largest Positive Number: </text><text x="0" y="42.75" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">(2 - 2^-(M-1)) * 2^(MaxE - Bias)</text><text x="0" y="68.125" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr"></text><text x="0" y="93.5" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Smallest Positive Number:</text><text x="0" y="118.875" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">1 * 2^(MinE - Bias)</text><text x="0" y="144.25" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr"></text><text x="0" y="169.625" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Second Smallest Positive number:</text><text x="0" y="195" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">(1 + 2^-(M-1)) * 2^(MinE - Bias)</text></g><g transform="translate(296.1926812065976 1779.2072651869908) rotate(0 179 17.5)"><text x="0" y="24" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="27.57666143380406px" fill="#364fc7" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Addition and Subtraction: </text></g><g transform="translate(296.1926812065976 1823.7072651869908) rotate(0 220.5 76)"><text x="0" y="17.333333333333332" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Let N1 = (-1)^S1 * F1 * 2^E1)</text><text x="0" y="42.666666666666664" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">And N2 = (-1)^S2 * F2 * 2^E2)</text><text x="0" y="68" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Consider E1 > E2</text><text x="0" y="93.33333333333333" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Then N1 +- N2 = (-1)^S1 * (F1 +- F2') * 2^E1</text><text x="0" y="118.66666666666666" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Where F2' = F2 / 2^(E1 - E2) </text><text x="0" y="144" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr"></text></g><g transform="translate(298.08157009548586 2000.09615407588) rotate(0 58.5 16.5)"><text x="0" y="23" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="26.410256410256395px" fill="#364fc7" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Multiply: </text></g><g transform="translate(298.08157009548586 2050.6517096314346) rotate(0 303.5 50.5)"><text x="0" y="17.25" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Let N1 = (-1)^S1 * F1 * 2^E1)</text><text x="0" y="42.5" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">And N2 = (-1)^S2 * F2 * 2^E2)</text><text x="0" y="67.75" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Then N1 * N2  = (-1)^(S1 xor S2) * (F1 * F2) * 2^(E1 + E2)</text><text x="0" y="93" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Since 1 <= F1 * F2 < 4 the result may need to be normalized</text></g><g transform="translate(642.8786756727427 1409.5404764500122) rotate(0 190 46)"><text x="0" y="64" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="72.51473527987905px" fill="#364fc7" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Operations</text></g><g transform="translate(847.3133273654512 1537.7374368992305) rotate(0 52 18)"><text x="0" y="25" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="28.88888888888905px" fill="#364fc7" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Division</text></g><g transform="translate(847.3133273654512 1584.7122090346465) rotate(0 312.5 50.5)"><text x="0" y="17.25" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Let N1 = (-1)^S1 * F1 * 2^E1)</text><text x="0" y="42.5" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">And N2 = (-1)^S2 * F2 * 2^E2)</text><text x="0" y="67.75" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Then N1 * N2  = (-1)^(S1 xor S2) * (F1 / F2) * 2^(E1 - E2)</text><text x="0" y="93" font-family="Virgil, Segoe UI Emoji" font-size="20px" fill="#000000" text-anchor="start" style="white-space: pre;" direction="ltr">Since 0.5 < F1 / F2 <= 1 the result may need to be normalized</text></g></svg>
